thread.section_title: Hotel Elysees 8 - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very nice hotel in the middle of Paris
thread.title_full: Very nice hotel in the middle of Paris - Review of Hotel Elysees 8, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Robert S
title: Very nice hotel in the middle of Paris
text: Very nice, if unspectacular hotel. Reception is open all night, and very friendly. Nice (if small) rooms and bathrooms, agreeable breakfast. Parking is a major issue: I bumped my car trying to manoeuvre between concrete columns and stairs, steel poles, etc. But then again: this is Paris. Location is very convenient - if you are not afraid of walking, you can get anywhere from here - alternatively, there is a metro entrance nearby.
